data.text: Vinoga kuja gate dinyalile kuditindiwalo,
Mtumwa mbala kosola hanhu ha mwana yogela kinyala,
Zahabu na shaba vopimigwa muumoto,
Yosang'hana mbuli zihile kotegeleza gehile,
Yomzeha mkiwa, komuliga yamulumbile,
Wavele oigodela wazukulu zao,
Mbuli zinogile hazikala mmulomo wa munhu hakona kinyala kutenda gehile,
Munhu yolava hongo kaigala na hilizi,
Yogela kumgongo gehile ga wayage kogala umbwiga,
Kuzumigwa kwa munhu yotanga goya kokwingila ng'hani muumoyo,
Goyogelegeza munhu yosang'hana gehile kulema ganogile,
Vinoga kuiting'hana na simba mtwanzi yabokigwe wanage,
Yobweleza gehile hanhu ha ganogile,
Kusonga ugomvi kuigala na kugavugulila mazi,
Kumuleka msang'hana gehile na kumtagusa mwene haki,
Yofaya choni kwa mbozi kuwa na sente mmakono gake za kugulila ubala,
Mbwiga wa kweli ayo mbwiga siku zose,
Munhu hagelegeza goya koika lahani kwa deni da munhu iyagwe.
Yonogelwa na ndwagi konogelwa na nzambi,
Munhu yeli na moyo wa usede honda yapate ganogile,
Mwana zozolo mzigo kwa tatake,
Kuwa na deng'ho muumoyo ayo dawa,
Munhu yehile kobokela hongo kinyelegezi,
Munhu mwene nzewele meso gake golola ubala,
Mwana mbozi mzigo kwa tatake,
Havinogile kumtoza fidiya munhu yelibule kitala,
Yoikimila kulonga kotanga vinhu,
Hata mbozi yahanyamala kokoneka kana ubala,
